    • Method Detail

      • addExplorer

        void addExplorer(Explorer explorer)
        This methode can be used to add new player (explorer) in the game.
        Parameters:
        explorer - the explorer to add.
        Throws:
        GameException - Thrown if it isn't possible to add any new explorer to the game.

      • moveForward

        void moveForward()
        Make all exploring explorers move forward in the cave. The explorers share what they found.

      • isOver

        boolean isOver()
        Declares if it's the end of the game.
        Returns:
        true if it's the end of the game.

      • getCave

        Cave getCave()
        Return the cave of the game.
        Returns:
        the game's cave.

      • getExplorers

        java.util.List<Explorer> getExplorers()
        Give all explorers of the game. They could be exploring or leaving.
        Returns:
        all the explorers of the game.

      • getExploringExplorers

        java.util.List<Explorer> getExploringExplorers()
        Give all explorers which are exploring.
        Returns:
        explorers in the cave.

      • handleExplorerDecisionToLeave

        void handleExplorerDecisionToLeave(Explorer explorer)
        Consider the choice of the explorer to leave the cave.
        Parameters:
        explorer - The explorer who make the choice to leave.
        Throws:
        GameException - If the explorer is not in the current game.

      • start

        void start()
        Checks if there are enough explorers before the game starts.
        Throws:
        GameException - Exception thrown if the amount of players is incorrect.

      • isThereEnoughExplorer

        boolean isThereEnoughExplorer()
        Checks if there is at least 3 explorers.
        Returns:
        True if there is at least 3 explorers.

      • isItPossibleToAddExplorer

        boolean isItPossibleToAddExplorer()
        Checks if it is still possible to add new explorers to the game.
        Returns:
        True if it is possible to add new explorers to the game

      • getWinner

        java.util.List<Explorer> getWinner()
        Returns a list with the winner(s) of the game, the players with the most rubies.
        Returns:
        The winner or winner of the game.
